channel.title: Adding clan chat rank sprites
channel.description: i was wondering if anyone could help me add clan chat sprites to my client and possibly server[pi]. I want get a clan ranking system like runescape if that is possible on [pi] my client is similar to galkons. ill pay someone to add it 100% working just like rs if its possible thanks =)
